entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then clearing. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill minus 38 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
